file.title: Window events

p.text: event window provides access to the properties and commands that Window , which has at the moment is some event . Or have any object , located on this window , the event occurs.

p.textAll:
For example, in this case event window provides access to the properties and command Okna1 , because event occurs in Knopki1 , and the button is located on Okne1
Thus, event window does not provide nothing new , it only makes the creation of action. For now, if you want to change the property window, over which the event occurred , does not necessarily indicate its name (such Window1) and you can simply specify the name of universal event window

i.text: Все возможные свойства и команды объекта:
